title: Censor

fields.name: Reprimand (1x, Charge 40%):
fields.value: Your target will be unable to speak, vote, or request Hello Neighbors during the following day phase. You may use this ability multiple times in one night, provided you have ammo.

fields.name: Cancel Voter Registration (3x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Your target's day and evening votes will not count for the rest of the game.

fields.name: Inspect Electors:
fields.value: Use during the evening phase after a player has been lynched. Learn the alignment breakdown of the players who voted for the lynched player (e.g. 3 Town, 2 Mafia, 1 Neutral). This ability has a (your score)% chance of ignoring investigative modifiers, and you will be notified if you roll this.

fields.name: Conduct Census (2x):
fields.value: Use during any phase. Learn the alignment breakdown of all players (e.g. 5 Town, 4 Mafia, 3 Neutral) alive at the beginning of that phase. This ability has a (your score)% chance of ignoring investigative modifiers, and you will be notified if you roll this.

fields.name: Influential (Passive):
fields.value: You may request two Hello Neighbors each day phase. Additionally, if at least one of your prior Cancel Voter Registration targets is alive, your vote counts double during the day phase.

desc:
Post 0.0x
*One of the most powerful offices of the Roman Republic has been reduced to a political naughty word.*
